long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Syncless Chat is a Chrome extension that adds a Less Annoying CRM sidebar to WhatsApp Web.

With Syncless Chat, you can quickly add contacts, pipeline items, and schedule tasks without leaving WhatsApp Web. Easily save the most important messages as a note in your CRM with one click.

Simply install the extension and open WhatsApp Web to start using the Syncless Chat's sidebar.
